data.comment: The match has started.
In Fontvieille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 5, Clement Turpin signals a PSG throw-in in Monaco's half.
PSG have a goal kick.
Monaco's Sofiane Diop breaks free at Stade Louis II. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 8, Ball goes out of play for a PSG goal kick.
Throw-in for PSG in the half of Monaco.
Monaco's Kevin Volland is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 12, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in PSG.
In Fontvieille PSG attack through Angel Di Maria. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 18, It's a goal kick for the home team in Fontvieille.
Clement Turpin awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Monaco in the half of PSG.
In the minute 20, PSG's Danilo Pereira has been booked in Fontvieille.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in PSG's half?
In the minute 24, Monaco are coming forward and Youssouf Fofana gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for PSG at Stade Louis II.
PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Goal! PSG have got their heads in front thanks to a Kylian Mbappe strike.
Clement Turpin awards PSG a goal kick.
Goal kick for PSG at Stade Louis II.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
Monaco are pushing forward but Gelson Martins's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a PSG goal kick.
In the minute 31, Free kick PSG.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Monaco to take a throw-in in PSG territory.
In the minute 33, Willem Geubbels (Monaco) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fontvieille.
PSG advance rapidly upfield but Clement Turpin blows for offside.
In the minute 34, Clement Turpin signals a PSG throw-in in Monaco's half.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for PSG.
In Fontvieille, PSG push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 35, Youssouf Fofana (Monaco) has received a first yellow card.
PSG are going well in Fontvieille. They now lead 0-2 thanks to a Kylian Mbappe penalty.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 39, PSG are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Kylian Mbappe for PSG is whistled offside.
PSG apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Kylian Mbappe. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
In the minute 45, Clement Turpin will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
The first half has been concluded at Stade Louis II.
The second-half is underway in Fontvieille.
Can PSG capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 46, Caio Henrique is replacing Fode Toure for the home team.
The home team replace Willem Geubbels with Cesc Fabregas.
In the minute 47, Angel Di Maria for PSG gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Monaco have a goal kick.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Monaco's Aurelien Tchouameni misses with an attempt on goal.
Clement Turpin awards PSG a goal kick.
Caio Henrique (Monaco) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Monaco.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Clement Turpin.
Goal! Kevin Volland pulls one back to make it 1-2.
In the minute 54, Clement Turpin signals a free kick to PSG.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
Throw-in for PSG in the half of Monaco.
In the minute 57, Clement Turpin signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
Clement Turpin awards PSG a goal kick.
Neymar is on a sub for Angel Di Maria for PSG.
In the minute 61, Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in PSG's half?
PSG awarded a throw-in in their own half.
PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Moise Kean of PSG gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
Goal! Kevin Volland levels the match at 2-2.
In the minute 65, Great play from Cesc Fabregas to set up the goal.
In Fontvieille PSG drive forward through Neymar. His shot is on target but it's saved.
PSG make their fourth substitution with Kays Ruiz Atil replacing Danilo Pereira.
In the minute 68, PSG make their second substitution with Mitchel Bakker replacing Layvin Kurzawa.
Leandro Paredes is on a sub for Kylian Mbappe for PSG.
Free kick for PSG in the half of Monaco.
In the minute 73, PSG have been awarded a corner by Clement Turpin.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Monaco's Cesc Fabregas gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 75, Ball goes out of play for a PSG goal kick.
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 79, In Fontvieille PSG attack through Pablo Sarabia. The finish is off target, however.
Monaco have a goal kick.
Pablo Sarabia gets his shot on target but fails to score for PSG.
In the minute 80, Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Monaco.
Kays Ruiz Atil (PSG) gets a yellow card.
Monaco have been given a penalty...
In the minute 81, It's a goal kick for the away team in Fontvieille.
Abdou Diallo (PSG) is red-carded and dismissed.
Goal! The home team take a 3-2 lead thanks to a penalty from Cesc Fabregas.
In the minute 85, Alessandro Florenzi is replacing Rafinha for PSG at Stade Louis II.
Cesc Fabregas is booked for the home team.
In the minute 88, Free kick Monaco.
Presnel Kimpembe (PSG) has received a yellow card from Clement Turpin.
Clement Turpin awards PSG a goal kick.
PSG to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
At Stade Louis II the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as PSG is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for PSG at Stade Louis II.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
Clement Turpin blows to end the match. The final score is 3-2.
Niko Kovac (Monaco) is making a third substitution, with Florentino Luis replacing Aurelien Tchouameni.
Niko Kovac is making the team's fourth substitution at Stade Louis II with Eliot Matazo replacing Gelson Martins.
The home team replace Sofiane Diop with Stevan Jovetic.
